channel.title: Data Sources on opt-models
channel.description: Recent content in Data Sources on opt-models

item.title: Optimization Toolchain: Major Component Overview
item.description: An overview of the modern optimization toolchain typically deployed in commercial applications: data sources, glue languages, modeling langs/tools, solvers and optional user interfaces.

item.title: Optimization Toolchain: Data Sources
item.description: Discussing common data sources for optimization models and their various means of connection to the model.

item.title: LEGO® Opt App: Connect Model to Data
item.description: We establish a connection via an import script (written in the AMPL scripting syntax, later to be replaced by a Python script) to a collection of CSV and flat text data files.
